title: Why aren't I getting chests for getting an S
body: I have gotten a couple of S' now and to my suprise I haven't gotten a single chest out of any of them, for a while I thought you have to get an S on a premade game to get a chest but researched it and found out that's not the case at all. It would seem to me that there might be a problem with my account or a bug of some sort, if any of you know what the problem is please tell me, also I would love to know if any of you are facing the same problem and not just me. Thank you.

replies.body: I am also having the same problem with not receiving a chest when one of my team members or I earn an S or above. Since the addition of sorting which champs still have their chest available, I know for certain that I did not have a chest earned on either champ I played when someone earned an S. I thought perhaps it was because I was in a solo queue, but I would think that wouldn't be the case since people earn chests in solo queue all the time. Also, I have 4 chests available to earn currently, so it isn't as if I have reached the limit of chests either.

There are some requirements to grab a mastery chest.  In addition to having a chest drop available for the week, you'll need to also own the champion.  Also per the [hextech crafting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) guide, you can only receive a chest once per champion per season.  I hope that helps!
I have got an S on champions I played and still haven't got a chest even when I got an S, and I didn't get one for the season yet on that specific champ
Which champ is it?  Do you currently own it?
have you checked and made sure you still have chest drops and that you havent already gotten a chest for that character?
